name: repurposed_structures:run_down_house/side_pool

element._comment1: This side piece will only spawn if that side piece is entirely outside or inside the calling piece's bounding box
element._comment2: Intersecting pieces is not allowed in Jigsaw structures so plan accordingly!
element._comment3: To spawn a piece entirely outside a calling piece, make sure the Jigsaw block of the calling
element._comment4: piece is facing outward on the edge of its bounding box. To spawn a piece entirely contained
element._comment5: inside a calling piece, have the jigsaw block face inward and that there is enough space in
element._comment6: the calling piece's boundaries to spawn a smaller inner piece.
